body_html: @zou3519 Is the doc good enough now? It's a bit hard to explain what meshgrid does in language. When I was learning meshgrid for the first time, I read the doc from numpy and matlab, and understand neither of these, until I see an example...

body: @zou3519 Is the doc good enough now? It's a bit hard to explain what `meshgrid` does in language. When I was learning `meshgrid` for the first time, I read the doc from numpy and matlab, and understand neither of these, until I see an example...
